goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a yellow object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.4: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
